tweet: Thankful for our teams at @SCDOTPress, @SCEMD, @SCDPS_PIO, and all of our city, county, and statewide partners who are responding to this weekend‚Äôs winter storm. Our state is grateful for their dedicated service.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Our team is prepared for this weekend's winter storm. We have had crews working for the past several days getting equipment pre-positioned and treating roads for the expected ice.   If you're in an impacted region, be prepared, check your local news for updates, and stay safe.  https://t.co/bO7JmmYV3A

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Tune in LIVE for an update ahead of this weekend's expected winter storm.  WATCH:  https://t.co/f7uJhi0XWe

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Today I declared a State of Emergency in preparation for this weekend's expected winter storm. The storm will likely begin Sunday morning. I urge South Carolinians to monitor their local weather forecasts and begin taking safety precautions.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Today's SCOTUS ruling on OSHA is a victory for the rule of law, federalism, and the Constitution. South Carolina employers can breathe a little easier today knowing that President Biden and the Democrat's radical agenda and illegal OSHA mandate has been exposed and disposed.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: We are monitoring the possibility of winter storm weather in the Upstate and Midlands region this weekend. Residents in these areas should start monitoring local weather forecasts and prepare safety precautions ahead of this weekend.   Learn more:  https://t.co/c3UKU9UrjM

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Joined @1stLadySC this morning to receive our COVID-19 booster shot.  If you want the shot, I encourage you to go get one.   Find a location:  https://t.co/naJMC8udn8  https://t.co/9YBTxkvT4x

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Today I announced my FY 2022-23 Executive Budget and provided my American Rescue Plan Act recommendations. The $2.4 billion in ARPA funds along with the almost $3 billion in surplus revenue generated by SC's booming economy - presents us with a once in a lifetime opportunity.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: South Carolina will always have the back of our law enforcement officers. Every day, they put their lives on the line to keep our communities safe, and today, on Law Enforcement Appreciation Day, we pay them a debt of gratitude.  https://t.co/JhGlXEEiOr

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Director Stirling has applied his innovative leadership towards improving the Department of Corrections and it has paid off with the lowest recidivism rate in the country.  Congratulations on this well-deserved recognition, Director.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Thank you for never giving up. For standing in the breech. Fighting the just fight. For saving the lives of children yet to be born.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Last year, I signed the Heartbeat Bill into law. This new law is going to save the lives of the unborn. This would not have been possible without the years of hard work, dedication and sacrifice of the leaders who stood with us last night.

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Thank you, South Carolina Citizens for Life, for hosting me at your Proudly Pro-Life Dinner last night. The right to life is the most precious of rights and we must never let it be taken away.  https://t.co/6dMBDGHh8H

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: We will not shut down our state, close businesses and schools, or impose vaccine and mask mandates. It is not necessary because we know how to deal with this virus.  https://t.co/z16njKmtSe

name: Gov. Henry McMaster
tweet: Happy New Year, South Carolina! Peggy and I wish you a year filled with joy and prosperity.  https://t.co/mHtmmqz6Ax
